WorkItem.Description:
I loaded the web version of Rawr4, clicked ok on the welcome screen that pops up.
Went to Options>Reset all Caches, then clicked on Yes when it asked me if I was sure.
Also tried loading a toon first before trying to reset and got the same error.
 
I have performed the Suggested Fix and continue to receive this error. If I am posting this message without having performed the Suggested Fix I am aware that I am consuming the Developer(s) time in managing my Issue unnecessarily.
 
== Version: 4.1.2.0 ==
 
== Error Message ==
[Arg_NullReferenceException]
Arguments: 
Debugging resource strings are unavailable. Often the key and arguments provide sufficient information to diagnose the problem. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=106663&Version=4.0.60129.0&File=mscorlib.dll&Key=Arg_NullReferenceException

Comments.Message: The new Set Bonuses framework has an issue where it may not have initialized yet at the time it's called for this process. Changed it so that it will recalc at any time of being called when it's still null.
